texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I'm back.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Welcome back! You were out shopping, right? We're having Italian today?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Yes. I also acquired this.
Izumo says as she pulls two bottles from her shopping bag and sets them on the table.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Oh, wine.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Wine? That's alcohol?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Yeah. You can only make it from plants with high sugar content, so we never could have had this back underground.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: So it's not like that corn whiskey thing.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: That was just distilled liquor. This is fermented. You make it in a different way, and it certainly tastes different. I've never actually drunk any, though. I'm just reciting stuff from encyclopedias.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: The owner of the new liquor store in the market is a wine connoisseur.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Wow!

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: He heard the story of Hatano Rin here, and that kickstarted his new hobby.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Whoa!

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: That's the part where Arishima gets mad, right? Don't think they ever got to drink that in the end, huh?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Since this locale is plentiful in seafood, he recommended we try different types of white wine.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: That's great! Let's drink!
Izumo nods as she sets three glasses on the table.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: It'll be my first time drinking wine!
Izumo dexterously removes the cork from one of the bottles.
I can't help but stare as a thought crosses my mind.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Why the dour face, Kaito?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Err... Just wondering what could happen to Izumo if she drinks.
Izumo looks up and returns my gaze.
...Could she be offended?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I have always had an inebriation function.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: A what?!

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Lonely topsider bachelors apparently liked to make drinking partners out of androids.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Makes sense. It doesn't sound very fun to get drunk on your own while your company is all sober.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: That's amazing! It means we can all get drunk together!
Izumo nods and holds up the bottle.
She then pours an equal amount of wine into the three glasses.
The thin glasses condensate ever so slightly, frosting the honey-colored liquid as it settles.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Enjoy.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Thanks!

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Yeah, thank you.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Cheers.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Cheers!

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You two are awful! You still just see me as a friggin android, don't you?! You think I don't know?!

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Ahahahah! That's your drunk program? Man, what a drag!

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Now I'm the drag?! I'll have you know we all have the same bodies in this world! I'm not made out of metal!

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: We've never thought of you as a machine to begin with, silly! Right?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Huh? Uh, yeah.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Look how he faltered! He had to think about it! You think I'm blind or what!? I'm not stupid, you know?!

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: No, Izumo, I...
The inebriation feature is actually pretty good. Her cheeks are slightly red and all.
Someone would actually program this kind of personality for a drinking partner?
I really don't know what goes through the mind of topsiders sometimes.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I can see it already! He's thinking something mighty rude about me again! By the Lord, I hope you're not having any dirty thoughts about me!

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I can see right through that clueless face of yours!

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Kaito's a creepy drunk like that?!

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Nah, nah, he's always been a dirty perv! I know better than anyone!

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Agreed.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I think you've had a little too much to drink, Izumo.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: No such thing! It's impossible for me to drink too much! Though you wouldn't know that, would you? Not something you saw in one of your dumb encyclopedias, right?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Of course not...

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Aahahahahah!

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Pfft, what's that laughter?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: This guy's just a riot.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: I feel like a clown.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: And you wouldn't be wrong! Life in the virtual space sure is a riot with a clown like you around! Ahahahahah!
Izumo downs the rest of her wine then proceeds to pour herself another generous glassful.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: She's so much fun! We should do this more often.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Y-Yeah... Very, very occasionally.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Stop that! Don't get chummy in front of me! I've had enough of your damn flirting! I live in this house too! Have some decency!

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: We're not! I swear!

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: You are! You totally are!

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: We're just talking about how we should drink together again.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Really? Is he telling the truth, Yonagi?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Yeah, for real! He said we can do this again sometime. Very occasionally, he said.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Excuse me?!

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Ahahahahah!
She throws her head back and lets out a maniacal laugh before letting her head drop back down... all the way forward until it thunks sonorously against the table.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I-Izumo?

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: Wh-What a riot... Heheh... Drinkin's fun...

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: I love you all... Kaito, Yonagi, Wooleep...

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Izumo?

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: She fell asleep?

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: I think this is the first time I've ever seen her sleep.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: She never really slept back in the low side.
I fetch a blanket from a shelf and cover Izumo with it.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: She looked like she was having a blast, heheh.
I nod, feeling a conflicted smile forming on my face.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: From an engineer's point of view, I'm really taken aback by how thorough the creator of this inebriation feature was.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Ahahah! Right! But it was fun. Izumo's such a good girl.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Yeah, that she is.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: The white wine's delicious too. Let's drink a bit more. Here.
Yonagi tips the mouth of the bottle towards me.
I drink the last bit of wine left in my glass and present it to her.
She carefully pours me another glass.
Then I do the same for her.

texts.name: Yonagi
texts.text: Here's to our precious family getting drunk together for the first time.
We raise our glasses and share a quiet moment.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Haah...
Next morning.
We drank quite a lot yesterday.
In the end, Yonagi and I stayed up drinking until dawn.
We ended up passing out on the sofa.
I look next to me, my groggy eyes protesting against the light.
Yonagi is still sleeping away peacefully.
I give her head a light stroke and cover her bare shoulders with a blanket.
I need to drink some water.
I get up, my raw throat urging me on.
Izumo's still sprawled over the dinner table.
In the same position as we left her yesterday, worryingly enough.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Izumo?!
But then, she stirs from her sleep.
She slowly raises her head, directing her expressionless gaze at me.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: ...Morning.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: ...Good morning.
Her voice sounds slightly more subdued than usual.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: Uh, you okay?
She shakes her head.

texts.name: Izumo
texts.text: My head hurts.
We stay put for what seems like ten minutes, the only sounds in the room the hush of the tide outside and Yonagi's soft breathing.
Izumo keeps her gaze set steady on me the whole time.

texts.name: Kaito
texts.text: You have a hangover function too?!
